```

RealWorldãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã¯[OpenAPIä»•æ§˜](https://github.com/gothinkster/realworld/blob/main/api/openapi.yml)ã‚’æä¾›ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã€APIã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒˆã®å‹ã‚’è‡ªå‹•çš„ã«ç”Ÿæˆã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚ç§ãŸã¡ã¯[`openapi-fetch`ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸](https://openapi-ts.pages.dev/openapi-fetch/)ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã®ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã«ã¯TypeScriptã®å‹ã‚’è‡ªå‹•ç”Ÿæˆã™ã‚‹ãƒ„ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚‚å«ã¾ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

æ¬¡ã®ã‚³ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ã‚’å®Ÿè¡Œã—ã¦ã€APIã®æœ€æ–°ã®å‹ã‚’ç”Ÿæˆã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚

```
npm run generate-api-types
```

ãã®çµæœã€`shared/api/v1.d.ts`ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ãŒä½œæˆã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã®ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã—ã¦ã€`shared/api/client.ts`ã§å‹ä»˜ãAPIã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

shared/api/client.ts

```
import createClient from "openapi-fetch";

import { backendBaseUrl } from "shared/config";
import type { paths } from "./v1";

export const { GET, POST, PUT, DELETE } = createClient<paths>({ baseUrl: backendBaseUrl });
```

shared/api/index.ts

```
export { GET, POST, PUT, DELETE } from "./client";
```

### ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ‰å†…ã®å®Ÿãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿[â€‹](#ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ‰å†…ã®å®Ÿãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ "ã“ã®è¦‹å‡ºã—ã¸ã®ç›´æ¥ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯")

ã“ã‚Œã§ã€ãƒãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ‰ã‹ã‚‰è¨˜äº‹ã‚’å–å¾—ã—ã€ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã«è¿½åŠ ã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚ã¾ãšã€è¨˜äº‹ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ“ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’å®Ÿè£…ã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚

`pages/feed/ui/ArticlePreview.tsx`ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã€æ¬¡ã®å†…å®¹ã‚’è¨˜è¿°ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

pages/feed/ui/ArticlePreview\.tsx

```
export function ArticlePreview({ article }) { /* TODO */ }
```

ç§ãŸã¡ã¯TypeScriptã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã®ã§ã€å‹ä»˜ãã®Articleã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã‚’æŒã¤ã¨è‰¯ã„ã§ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚ç”Ÿæˆã•ã‚ŒãŸ`v1.d.ts`ã‚’èª¿ã¹ã‚‹ã¨ã€Articleã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã¯`components["schemas"]["Article"]`ã‚’ä»‹ã—ã¦åˆ©ç”¨å¯èƒ½ã§ã‚ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã‚ã‹ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã‚Œã§Sharedå±¤å†…ã«ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ã‚’æŒã¤ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã€ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ã‚’ã‚¨ã‚¯ã‚¹ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚

shared/api/models.ts

```
import type { components } from "./v1";

export type Article = components["schemas"]["Article"];
```

shared/api/index.ts

```
export { GET, POST, PUT, DELETE } from "./client";

export type { Article } from "./models";
```

ã“ã‚Œã§ã€è¨˜äº‹ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ“ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆã«æˆ»ã£ã¦ã€ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã§ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¯ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ã‚’åŸ‹ã‚ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚æ¬¡ã®å†…å®¹ã‚’ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆã«è¿½åŠ ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

pages/feed/ui/ArticlePreview\.tsx

```
import { Link } from "@remix-run/react";
import type { Article } from "shared/api";

interface ArticlePreviewProps {
  article: Article;
}

export function ArticlePreview({ article }: ArticlePreviewProps) {
  return (
    <div className="article-preview">
      <div className="article-meta">
        <Link to={`/profile/${article.author.username}`} prefetch="intent">
          <img src={article.author.image} alt="" />
        </Link>
        <div className="info">
          <Link
            to={`/profile/${article.author.username}`}
            className="author"
            prefetch="intent"
          >
            {article.author.username}
          </Link>
          <span className="date" suppressHydrationWarning>
            {new Date(article.createdAt).toLocaleDateString(undefined, {
              dateStyle: "long",
            })}
          </span>
        </div>
        <button className="btn btn-outline-primary btn-sm pull-xs-right">
          <i className="ion-heart"></i> {article.favoritesCount}
        </button>
      </div>
      <Link
        to={`/article/${article.slug}`}
        className="preview-link"
        prefetch="intent"
      >
        <h1>{article.title}</h1>
        <p>{article.description}</p>
        <span>ç¶šãã‚’èª­ã‚€...</span>
        <ul className="tag-list">
          {article.tagList.map((tag) => (
            <li key={tag} className="tag-default tag-pill tag-outline">
              {tag}
            </li>
          ))}
        </ul>
      </Link>
    </div>
  );
}
```

ã€Œã„ã„ã­ã€ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã¯ã¾ã æ©Ÿèƒ½ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚ãã‚Œã¯è¨˜äº‹ã®èª­ã¿å–ã‚Šãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã«ç§»å‹•ã—ã¦ã€ã€Œã„ã„ã­ã€æ©Ÿèƒ½ã‚’å®Ÿè£…ã™ã‚‹ã¨ãã«ä¿®æ­£ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

ã“ã‚Œã§ã€è¨˜äº‹ã‚’å–å¾—ã—ã¦ã€ãŸãã•ã‚“ã®ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ“ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’è¡¨ç¤ºã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚Remixã§ã¯ã€ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã®å–å¾—ã¯*ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ¼*ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã—ã¦è¡Œã‚ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ¼ã¯ã€ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã«å¿…è¦ãªãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’åé›†ã™ã‚‹ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼é–¢æ•°ã§ã™ã€‚ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ¼ã¯ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®ä»£ã‚ã‚Šã«APIã¨ã‚„ã‚Šå–ã‚Šã‚’ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã€`api`ã‚»ã‚°ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã«é…ç½®ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

pages/feed/api/loader.ts

```
import { json } from "@remix-run/node";

import { GET } from "shared/api";

export const loader = async () => {
  const { data: articles, error, response } = await GET("/articles");

  if (error !== undefined) {
    throw json(error, { status: response.status });
  }

  return json({ articles });
};
```

ã“ã‚Œã‚’ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã«æ¥ç¶šã™ã‚‹ã«ã¯ã€ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒˆãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‹ã‚‰`loader`ã¨ã—ã¦ã‚¨ã‚¯ã‚¹ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

pages/feed/index.ts

```
export { FeedPage } from "./ui/FeedPage";
export { loader } from "./api/loader";
```

app/routes/\_index.tsx

```
import type { MetaFunction } from "@remix-run/node";
import { FeedPage } from "pages/feed";

export { loader } from "pages/feed";

export const meta: MetaFunction = () => {
  return [{ title: "Conduit" }];
};

export default FeedPage;
```

æœ€å¾Œã®ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒƒãƒ—ã¯ã€ã“ã‚Œã‚‰ã®ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã«è¡¨ç¤ºã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§ã™ã€‚`FeedPage`ã‚’æ¬¡ã®ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã§æ›´æ–°ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

pages/feed/ui/FeedPage.tsx

```
import { useLoaderData } from "@remix-run/react";

import type { loader } from "../api/loader";
import { ArticlePreview } from "./ArticlePreview";

export function FeedPage() {
  const { articles } = useLoaderData<typeof loader>();

  return (
    <div className="home-page">
      <div className="banner">
        <div className="container">
          <h1 className="logo-font">conduit</h1>
          <p>çŸ¥è­˜ã‚’å…±æœ‰ã™ã‚‹å ´</p>
        </div>
      </div>

      <div className="container page">
        <div className="row">
          <div className="col-md-9">
            {articles.articles.map((article) => (
              <ArticlePreview key={article.slug} article={article} />
            ))}
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}
```

### ã‚¿ã‚°ã«ã‚ˆã‚‹ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ«ã‚¿ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°[â€‹](#ã‚¿ã‚°ã«ã‚ˆã‚‹ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ«ã‚¿ãƒªãƒ³ã‚° "ã“ã®è¦‹å‡ºã—ã¸ã®ç›´æ¥ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯")

ã‚¿ã‚°ã«é–¢ã—ã¦ã¯ã€ãƒãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ‰ã‹ã‚‰å–å¾—ã—ã€ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ãŒé¸æŠã—ãŸã‚¿ã‚°ã‚’è¨˜æ†¶ã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ç§ãŸã¡ã¯ãƒãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ‰ã‹ã‚‰ã®å–å¾—æ–¹æ³•ã¯ã™ã§ã«çŸ¥ã£ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã‚Œã¯ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ¼é–¢æ•°ã‹ã‚‰ã®åˆ¥ã®ãƒªã‚¯ã‚¨ã‚¹ãƒˆã§ã™ã€‚ã™ã§ã«ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹`remix-utils`ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®ä¾¿åˆ©ãª`promiseHash`é–¢æ•°ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

`pages/feed/api/loader.ts`ã®ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ¼ã‚’æ¬¡ã®ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã§æ›´æ–°ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

pages/feed/api/loader.ts

```
import { json } from "@remix-run/node";
import type { FetchResponse } from "openapi-fetch";
import { promiseHash } from "remix-utils/promise";

import { GET } from "shared/api";

async function throwAnyErrors<T, O, Media extends `${string}/${string}`>(
  responsePromise: Promise<FetchResponse<T, O, Media>>,
) {
  const { data, error, response } = await responsePromise;

  if (error !== undefined) {
    throw json(error, { status: response.status });
  }

  return data as NonNullable<typeof data>;
}

export const loader = async () => {
  return json(
    await promiseHash({
      articles: throwAnyErrors(GET("/articles")),
      tags: throwAnyErrors(GET("/tags")),
    }),
  );
};
```

ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼å‡¦ç†ã‚’å…±é€šã®`throwAnyErrors`é–¢æ•°ã«ç§»ã—ãŸã“ã¨ã«æ°—ä»˜ã„ãŸã§ã—ã‚‡ã†ã‹ã€‚ãã‚Œã¯ã‹ãªã‚Šä½¿ãˆãã†ã«è¦‹ãˆã‚‹ã®ã§ã€å¾Œã§å†åˆ©ç”¨ã™ã‚‹ã‹ã‚‚ã—ã‚Œã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚

ã‚¿ã‚°ä¸€è¦§ã‚’ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¿ãƒ©ã‚¯ãƒ†ã‚£ãƒ–ã«ã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ã‚¿ã‚°ã‚’ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯ã™ã‚‹ã¨ã€ãã®ã‚¿ã‚°ãŒé¸æŠã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚Remixã®ä¼çµ±ã«å¾“ã„ã€é¸æŠã•ã‚ŒãŸã‚¿ã‚°ã®ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¨ã—ã¦URLã®ã‚¯ã‚¨ãƒªãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ãƒ–ãƒ©ã‚¦ã‚¶ã«ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’ä»»ã›ã€ç§ãŸã¡ã¯ã‚ˆã‚Šé‡è¦ãªã“ã¨ã«é›†ä¸­ã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚

`pages/feed/ui/FeedPage.tsx`ã‚’æ¬¡ã®ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã§æ›´æ–°ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

pages/feed/ui/FeedPage.tsx

```
import { Form, useLoaderData } from "@remix-run/react";
import { ExistingSearchParams } from "remix-utils/existing-search-params";

import type { loader } from "../api/loader";
import { ArticlePreview } from "./ArticlePreview";

export function FeedPage() {
  const { articles, tags } = useLoaderData<typeof loader>();

  return (
    <div className="home-page">
      <div className="banner">
        <div className="container">
          <h1 className="logo-font">conduit</h1>
          <p>çŸ¥è­˜ã‚’å…±æœ‰ã™ã‚‹å ´</p>
        </div>
      </div>

      <div className="container page">
        <div className="row">
          <div className="col-md-9">
            {articles.articles.map((article) => (
              <ArticlePreview key={article.slug} article={article} />
            ))}
          </div>

          <div className="col-md-3">
            <div className="sidebar">
              <p>äººæ°—ã®ã‚¿ã‚°</p>

              <Form>
                <ExistingSearchParams exclude={["tag"]} />
                <div className="tag-list">
                  {tags.tags.map((tag) => (
                    <button
                      key={tag}
                      name="tag"
                      value={tag}
                      className="tag-pill tag-default"
                    >
                      {tag}
                    </button>
                  ))}
                </div>
              </Form>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}
```

æ¬¡ã«ã€ã‚¿ã‚°ã®æ¤œç´¢ãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ¼ã§ä½¿ç”¨ã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚`pages/feed/api/loader.ts`ã®`loader`é–¢æ•°ã‚’æ¬¡ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«å¤‰æ›´ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

pages/feed/api/loader.ts

```
import { json, type LoaderFunctionArgs } from "@remix-run/node";
import type { FetchResponse } from "openapi-fetch";
import { promiseHash } from "remix-utils/promise";

import { GET } from "shared/api";

async function throwAnyErrors<T, O, Media extends `${string}/${string}`>(
  responsePromise: Promise<FetchResponse<T, O, Media>>,
) {
  const { data, error, response } = await responsePromise;

  if (error !== undefined) {
    throw json(error, { status: response.status });
  }

  return data as NonNullable<typeof data>;
}

export const loader = async ({ request }: LoaderFunctionArgs) => {
  const url = new URL(request.url);
  const selectedTag = url.searchParams.get("tag") ?? undefined;

  return json(
    await promiseHash({
      articles: throwAnyErrors(
        GET("/articles", { params: { query: { tag: selectedTag } } }),
      ),
      tags: throwAnyErrors(GET("/tags")),
    }),
  );
};
```

ä»¥ä¸Šã§ã™ã€‚æœ€çµ‚çš„ã«`model`ã‚»ã‚°ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã¯å¿…è¦ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã§ã—ãŸã€‚Remixã¯ã™ã”ã„ã§ã™ã‚ˆã­ã€‚

### ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³[â€‹](#ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ "ã“ã®è¦‹å‡ºã—ã¸ã®ç›´æ¥ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯")

åŒæ§˜ã«ã€ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚’å®Ÿè£…ã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚è‡ªåˆ†ã§å®Ÿè£…ã—ã¦ã¿ã¦ã‚‚ã€ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’ã‚³ãƒ”ãƒ¼ã—ã¦ã‚‚è‰¯ã„ã§ã™ã€‚

pages/feed/api/loader.ts

```
import { json, type LoaderFunctionArgs } from "@remix-run/node";
import type { FetchResponse } from "openapi-fetch";
import { promiseHash } from "remix-utils/promise";

import { GET } from "shared/api";

async function throwAnyErrors<T, O, Media extends `${string}/${string}`>(
  responsePromise: Promise<FetchResponse<T, O, Media>>,
) {
  const { data, error, response } = await responsePromise;

  if (error !== undefined) {
    throw json(error, { status: response.status });
  }

  return data as NonNullable<typeof data>;
}

/** 1ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚ãŸã‚Šã®è¨˜äº‹ã®æ•°ã€‚ */
export const LIMIT = 20;

export const loader = async ({ request }: LoaderFunctionArgs) => {
  const url = new URL(request.url);
  const selectedTag = url.searchParams.get("tag") ?? undefined;
  const page = parseInt(url.searchParams.get("page") ?? "", 10);

  return json(
    await promiseHash({
      articles: throwAnyErrors(
        GET("/articles", {
          params: {
            query: {
              tag: selectedTag,
              limit: LIMIT,
              offset: !Number.isNaN(page) ? page * LIMIT : undefined,
            },
          },
        }),
      ),
      tags: throwAnyErrors(GET("/tags")),
    }),
  );
};
```

pages/feed/ui/FeedPage.tsx

```
import { Form, useLoaderData, useSearchParams } from "@remix-run/react";
import { ExistingSearchParams } from "remix-utils/existing-search-params";

import { LIMIT, type loader } from "../api/loader";
import { ArticlePreview } from "./ArticlePreview";

export function FeedPage() {
  const [searchParams] = useSearchParams();
  const { articles, tags } = useLoaderData<typeof loader>();
  const pageAmount = Math.ceil(articles.articlesCount / LIMIT);
  const currentPage = parseInt(searchParams.get("page") ?? "1", 10);

  return (
    <div className="home-page">
      <div className="banner">
        <div className="container">
          <h1 className="logo-font">conduit</h1>
          <p>çŸ¥è­˜ã‚’å…±æœ‰ã™ã‚‹å ´</p>
        </div>
      </div>

      <div className="container page">
        <div className="row">
          <div className="col-md-9">
            {articles.articles.map((article) => (
              <ArticlePreview key={article.slug} article={article} />
            ))}

            <Form>
              <ExistingSearchParams exclude={["page"]} />
              <ul className="pagination">
                {Array(pageAmount)
                  .fill(null)
                  .map((_, index) =>
                    index + 1 === currentPage ? (
                      <li key={index} className="page-item active">
                        <span className="page-link">{index + 1}</span>
                      </li>
                    ) : (
                      <li key={index} className="page-item">
                        <button
                          className="page-link"
                          name="page"
                          value={index + 1}
                        >
                          {index + 1}
                        </button>
                      </li>
                    ),
                  )}
              </ul>
            </Form>
          </div>

          <div className="col-md-3">
            <div className="sidebar">
              <p>äººæ°—ã®ã‚¿ã‚°</p>

              <Form>
                <ExistingSearchParams exclude={["tag", "page"]} />
                <div className="tag-list">
                  {tags.tags.map((tag) => (
                    <button
                      key={tag}
                      name="tag"
                      value={tag}
                      className="tag-pill tag-default"
                    >
                      {tag}
                    </button>
                  ))}
                </div>
              </Form>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}
```

ã‚ˆã—ã€ã“ã‚Œã‚‚å®Ÿç¾ã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ã‚¿ã‚°ä¸€è¦§ã‚‚åŒæ§˜ã«å®Ÿè£…ã§ãã¾ã™ãŒã€èªè¨¼ã‚’å®Ÿè£…ã™ã‚‹ã¾ã§å¾…ã¡ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚ã¨ã“ã‚ã§ã€èªè¨¼ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã§ã™ãŒï¼

### èªè¨¼[â€‹](#èªè¨¼ "ã“ã®è¦‹å‡ºã—ã¸ã®ç›´æ¥ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯")

èªè¨¼ã«ã¯ã€ãƒ­ã‚°ã‚¤ãƒ³ç”¨ã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¨ç™»éŒ²ç”¨ã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®2ã¤ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã‚Œã‚‰ã¯ä¸»ã«éå¸¸ã«ä¼¼ã¦ã„ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã€å¿…è¦ã«å¿œã˜ã¦ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’å†åˆ©ç”¨ã§ãã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ã€1ã¤ã®`sign-in`ã‚»ã‚°ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã«ä¿æŒã™ã‚‹ã®ãŒç†ã«ã‹ãªã£ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

`pages/sign-in`ã®`ui`ã‚»ã‚°ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã«`RegisterPage.tsx`ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã€æ¬¡ã®å†…å®¹ã‚’é…ç½®ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

pages/sign-in/ui/RegisterPage.tsx

```
import { Form, Link, useActionData } from "@remix-run/react";

import type { register } from "../api/register";

export function RegisterPage() {
  const registerData = useActionData<typeof register>();

  return (
    <div className="auth-page">
      <div className="container page">
        <div className="row">
          <div className="col-md-6 offset-md-3 col-xs-12">
            <h1 className="text-xs-center">ç™»éŒ²</h1>
            <p className="text-xs-center">
              <Link to="/login">ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’ãŠæŒã¡ã§ã™ã‹ï¼Ÿ</Link>
            </p>

            {registerData?.error && (
              <ul className="error-messages">
                {registerData.error.errors.body.map((error) => (
                  <li key={error}>{error}</li>
                ))}
              </ul>
            )}

            <Form method="post">
              <fieldset className="form-group">
                <input
                  className="form-control form-control-lg"
                  type="text"
                  name="username"
                  placeholder="ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼å"
                />
              </fieldset>
              <fieldset className="form-group">
                <input
                  className="form-control form-control-lg"
                  type="text"
                  name="email"
                  placeholder="ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ã‚¹"
                />
              </fieldset>
              <fieldset className="form-group">
                <input
                  className="form-control form-control-lg"
                  type="password"
                  name="password"
                  placeholder="ãƒ‘ã‚¹ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ãƒ‰"
                />
              </fieldset>
              <button className="btn btn-lg btn-primary pull-xs-right">
                ç™»éŒ²
              </button>
            </Form>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}
```

ã“ã‚Œã‹ã‚‰ã¯å£Šã‚ŒãŸã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚’ä¿®æ­£ã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆãŒæ–°ã—ã„ã‚»ã‚°ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã«ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ã‚¹ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã€æ¬¡ã®ã‚³ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ã§ãã®ã‚»ã‚°ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚

```
npx fsd pages sign-in -s api
```

ãŸã ã—ã€ç™»éŒ²ã®ãƒãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ‰éƒ¨åˆ†ã‚’å®Ÿè£…ã™ã‚‹å‰ã«ã€Remixã®ã‚»ãƒƒã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³å‡¦ç†ã®ãŸã‚ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ•ãƒ©ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãŒå¿…è¦ã§ã™ã€‚ã“ã‚Œã¯ä»–ã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã§ã‚‚å¿…è¦ã«ãªã‚‹å¯èƒ½æ€§ãŒã‚ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã€Sharedå±¤ã«é…ç½®ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

æ¬¡ã®ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’`shared/api/auth.server.ts`ã«é…ç½®ã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚ã“ã®ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã¯Remixã«ç‰¹æœ‰ã®ã‚‚ã®ã§ã‚ã‚Šã€ã™ã¹ã¦ãŒç†è§£ã§ããªãã¦ã‚‚å¿ƒé…ã—ãªã„ã§ãã ã•ã„ã€‚å˜ã«ã‚³ãƒ”ãƒ¼ã—ã¦è²¼ã‚Šä»˜ã‘ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

shared/api/auth.server.ts

```
import { createCookieSessionStorage, redirect } from "@remix-run/node";
import invariant from "tiny-invariant";

import type { User } from "./models";

invariant(
  process.env.SESSION_SECRET,
  "SESSION_SECRET must be set for authentication to work",
);

const sessionStorage = createCookieSessionStorage<{
  user: User;
}>({
  cookie: {
    name: "__session",
    httpOnly: true,
    path: "/",
    sameSite: "lax",
    secrets: [process.env.SESSION_SECRET],
    secure: process.env.NODE_ENV === "production",
  },
});

export async function createUserSession({
  request,
  user,
  redirectTo,
}: {
  request: Request;
  user: User;
  redirectTo: string;
}) {
  const cookie = request.headers.get("Cookie");
  const session = await sessionStorage.getSession(cookie);

  session.set("user", user);

  return redirect(redirectTo, {
    headers: {
      "Set-Cookie": await sessionStorage.commitSession(session, {
        maxAge: 60 * 60 * 24 * 7, // 7æ—¥é–“
      }),
    },
  });
}

export async function getUserFromSession(request: Request) {
  const cookie = request.headers.get("Cookie");
  const session = await sessionStorage.getSession(cookie);

  return session.get("user") ?? null;
}

export async function requireUser(request: Request) {
  const user = await getUserFromSession(request);

  if (user === null) {
    throw redirect("/login");
  }

  return user;
}
```

ã¾ãŸã€`models.ts`ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‹ã‚‰`User`ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ã‚’ã‚¨ã‚¯ã‚¹ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

shared/api/models.ts

```
import type { components } from "./v1";

export type Article = components["schemas"]["Article"];
export type User = components["schemas"]["User"];
```

ã“ã®ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãŒå‹•ä½œã™ã‚‹å‰ã«ã€`SESSION_SECRET`ç’°å¢ƒå¤‰æ•°ã‚’è¨­å®šã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã®ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒˆã«`.env`ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã€`SESSION_SECRET=`ã‚’è¨˜è¿°ã—ã¦ã‹ã‚‰ã€é©å½“ã«ãƒ©ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒ ãªæ–‡å­—åˆ—ã‚’è¨˜å…¥ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚æ¬¡ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«ãªã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

.env

```
SESSION_SECRET=ã“ã‚Œã‚’ã‚³ãƒ”ãƒ¼ã—ãªã„ã§ãã ã•ã„
```

æœ€å¾Œã«ã€å…¬é–‹APIã«ã„ãã¤ã‹ã®ã‚¨ã‚¯ã‚¹ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚’è¿½åŠ ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

shared/api/index.ts

```
export { GET, POST, PUT, DELETE } from "./client";

export type { Article } from "./models";

export { createUserSession, getUserFromSession, requireUser } from "./auth.server";
```

ã“ã‚Œã§ã€RealWorldã®ãƒãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ‰ã¨é€šä¿¡ã™ã‚‹ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’æ›¸ãã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã‚Œã‚’`pages/sign-in/api`ã«ä¿å­˜ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚`register.ts`ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¦ã€ä¸­ã«æ¬¡ã®ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’é…ç½®ã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚

pages/sign-in/api/register.ts

```
import { json, type ActionFunctionArgs } from "@remix-run/node";

import { POST, createUserSession } from "shared/api";

export const register = async ({ request }: ActionFunctionArgs) => {
  const formData = await request.formData();
  const username = formData.get("username")?.toString() ?? "";
  const email = formData.get("email")?.toString() ?? "";
  const password = formData.get("password")?.toString() ?? "";

  const { data, error } = await POST("/users", {
    body: { user: { email, password, username } },
  });

  if (error) {
    return json({ error }, { status: 400 });
  } else {
    return createUserSession({
      request: request,
      user: data.user,
      redirectTo: "/",
    });
  }
};
```

pages/sign-in/index.ts

```
export { RegisterPage } from './ui/RegisterPage';
export { register } from './api/register';
```

ã»ã¼å®Œæˆã§ã™ï¼æ®‹ã‚Šã®éƒ¨åˆ†ã¯ã€`/register`ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒˆã«ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã¨ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’æ¥ç¶šã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã ã‘ã§ã™ã€‚`app/routes`ã§`register.tsx`ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

app/routes/register.tsx

```
import { RegisterPage, register } from "pages/sign-in";

export { register as action };

export default RegisterPage;
```

ã“ã‚Œã§ã€<http://localhost:3000/register>ã«ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ã‚¹ã™ã‚‹ã¨ã€ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã‚’ä½œæˆã§ãã¾ã™ï¼ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã®æ®‹ã‚Šã®éƒ¨åˆ†ã¯ã€ã¾ã åå¿œã—ã¾ã›ã‚“ãŒã€è¿‘ã€…å¯¾å‡¦ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

åŒæ§˜ã«ã€ãƒ­ã‚°ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’å®Ÿè£…ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚‚ã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚è‡ªåˆ†ã§å®Ÿè£…ã—ã¦ã¿ã‚‹ã‹ã€ä¸‹è¨˜ã®ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’ã‚³ãƒ”ãƒšã™ã‚‹ã‹ã€æ¬¡ã«é€²ã¿ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚

pages/sign-in/api/sign-in.ts

```
import { json, type ActionFunctionArgs } from "@remix-run/node";

import { POST, createUserSession } from "shared/api";

export const signIn = async ({ request }: ActionFunctionArgs) => {
  const formData = await request.formData();
  const email = formData.get("email")?.toString() ?? "";
  const password = formData.get("password")?.toString() ?? "";

  const { data, error } = await POST("/users/login", {
    body: { user: { email, password } },
  });

  if (error) {
    return json({ error }, { status: 400 });
  } else {
    return createUserSession({
      request: request,
      user: data.user,
      redirectTo: "/",
    });
  }
};
```

pages/sign-in/ui/SignInPage.tsx

```
import { Form, Link, useActionData } from "@remix-run/react";

import type { signIn } from "../api/sign-in";

export function SignInPage() {
  const signInData = useActionData<typeof signIn>();

  return (
    <div className="auth-page">
      <div className="container page">
        <div className="row">
          <div className="col-md-6 offset-md-3 col-xs-12">
            <h1 className="text-xs-center">ã‚µã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¤ãƒ³</h1>
            <p className="text-xs-center">
              <Link to="/register">ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆãŒå¿…è¦ã§ã™ã‹ï¼Ÿ</Link>
            </p>

            {signInData?.error && (
              <ul className="error-messages">
                {signInData.error.errors.body.map((error) => (
                  <li key={error}>{error}</li>
                ))}
              </ul>
            )}

            <Form method="post">
              <fieldset className="form-group">
                <input
                  className="form-control form-control-lg"
                  name="email"
                  type="text"
                  placeholder="ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ã‚¹"
                />
              </fieldset>
              <fieldset className="form-group">
                <input
                  className="form-control form-control-lg"
                  name="password"
                  type="password"
                  placeholder="ãƒ‘ã‚¹ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ãƒ‰"
                />
              </fieldset>
              <button className="btn btn-lg btn-primary pull-xs-right">
                ã‚µã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¤ãƒ³
              </button>
            </Form>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}
```

ã“ã‚Œã§ã€ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ãŒã“ã‚Œã‚‰ã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã«ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ã‚¹ã§ãã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ãªã‚Šã¾ã—ãŸã€‚

### ãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼[â€‹](#ãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼ "ã“ã®è¦‹å‡ºã—ã¸ã®ç›´æ¥ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯")

å‰ç« ã§èª¬æ˜ã•ã‚ŒãŸã‚ˆã†ã«ã€ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã®ãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼ã¯é€šå¸¸Widgetså±¤ã€ã¾ãŸã¯Sharedå±¤ã«é…ç½®ã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚ãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼ã¯éå¸¸ã«ã‚·ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ã§ã€ã™ã¹ã¦ã®ãƒ“ã‚¸ãƒã‚¹ãƒ­ã‚¸ãƒƒã‚¯ã‚’å¤–éƒ¨ã«ä¿æŒã§ãã‚‹ã®ã§ã€Sharedå±¤ã«é…ç½®ã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚ãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼ç”¨ã®ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒ€ãƒ¼ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

```

æ¬¡ã«ã€`shared/ui/Header.tsx`ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã€æ¬¡ã®å†…å®¹ã‚’é…ç½®ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

shared/ui/Header.tsx

```
import { useContext } from "react";
import { Link, useLocation } from "@remix-run/react";

import { CurrentUser } from "../api/currentUser";

export function Header() {
  const currentUser = useContext(CurrentUser);
  const { pathname } = useLocation();

  return (
    <nav className="navbar navbar-light">
      <div className="container">
        <Link className="navbar-brand" to="/" prefetch="intent">
          conduit
        </Link>
        <ul className="nav navbar-nav pull-xs-right">
          <li className="nav-item">
            <Link
              prefetch="intent"
              className={`nav-link ${pathname == "/" ? "active" : ""}`}
              to="/"
            >
              ãƒ›ãƒ¼ãƒ 
            </Link>
          </li>
          {currentUser == null ? (
            <>
              <li className="nav-item">
                <Link
                  prefetch="intent"
                  className={`nav-link ${pathname == "/login" ? "active" : ""}`}
                  to="/login"
                >
                  ã‚µã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¤ãƒ³
                </Link>
              </li>
              <li className="nav-item">
                <Link
                  prefetch="intent"
                  className={`nav-link ${pathname == "/register" ? "active" : ""}`}
                  to="/register"
                >
                  ç™»éŒ²
                </Link>
              </li>
            </>
          ) : (
            <>
              <li className="nav-item">
                <Link
                  prefetch="intent"
                  className={`nav-link ${pathname == "/editor" ? "active" : ""}`}
                  to="/editor"
                >
                  <i className="ion-compose"></i>&nbsp;æ–°ã—ã„è¨˜äº‹
                </Link>
              </li>

              <li className="nav-item">
                <Link
                  prefetch="intent"
                  className={`nav-link ${pathname == "/settings" ? "active" : ""}`}
                  to="/settings"
                >
                  {" "}
                  <i className="ion-gear-a"></i>&nbsp;è¨­å®š
                </Link>
              </li>
              <li className="nav-item">
                <Link
                  prefetch="intent"
                  className={`nav-link ${pathname.includes("/profile") ? "active" : ""}`}
                  to={`/profile/${currentUser.username}`}
                >
                  {currentUser.image && (
                    <img
                      width={25}
                      height={25}
                      src={currentUser.image}
                      className="user-pic"
                      alt=""
                    />
                  )}
                  {currentUser.username}
                </Link>
              </li>
            </>
          )}
        </ul>
      </div>
    </nav>
  );
}
```

ã“ã‚Œã§ã€ãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼ã‚’ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã«è¿½åŠ ã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚ã™ã¹ã¦ã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã«è¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ã€ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒˆã«è¿½åŠ ã—ã€ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆãƒ¬ãƒƒãƒˆï¼ˆãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ãŒãƒ¬ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°ã•ã‚Œã‚‹å ´æ‰€ï¼‰ã‚’`CurrentUser`ã®ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒã‚¤ãƒ€ãƒ¼ã§åŒ…ã¿ã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã‚Œã«ã‚ˆã‚Šã€ãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼ã‚’å«ã‚€ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªå…¨ä½“ãŒç¾åœ¨ã®ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã«ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ã‚¹ã§ãã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ãªã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ã¾ãŸã€ã‚¯ãƒƒã‚­ãƒ¼ã‹ã‚‰ç¾åœ¨ã®ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã‚’å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã®ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ¼ã‚‚è¿½åŠ ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚æ¬¡ã®ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’`app/root.tsx`ã«è¿½åŠ ã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚

app/root.tsx

```
import { cssBundleHref } from "@remix-run/css-bundle";
import type { LinksFunction, LoaderFunctionArgs } from "@remix-run/node";
import {
  Links,
  LiveReload,
  Meta,
  Outlet,
  Scripts,
  ScrollRestoration,
  useLoaderData,
} from "@remix-run/react";

import { Header } from "shared/ui";
import { getUserFromSession, CurrentUser } from "shared/api";

export const links: LinksFunction = () => [
  ...(cssBundleHref ? [{ rel: "stylesheet", href: cssBundleHref }] : []),
];

export const loader = ({ request }: LoaderFunctionArgs) =>
  getUserFromSession(request);

export default function App() {
  const user = useLoaderData<typeof loader>();

  return (
    <html lang="en">
      <head>
        <meta charSet="utf-8" />
        <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
        <Meta />
        <Links />
        <link
          href="//code.ionicframework.com/ionicons/2.0.1/css/ionicons.min.css"
          rel="stylesheet"
          type="text/css"
        />
        <link
          href="//fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Titillium+Web:700|Source+Serif+Pro:400,700|Merriweather+Sans:400,700|Source+Sans+Pro:400,300,600,700,300italic,400italic,600italic,700italic"
          rel="stylesheet"
          type="text/css"
        />
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="//demo.productionready.io/main.css" />
        <style>{`
          button {
            border: 0;
          }
        `}</style>
      </head>
      <body>
        <CurrentUser.Provider value={user}>
          <Header />
          <Outlet />
        </CurrentUser.Provider>
        <ScrollRestoration />
        <Scripts />
        <LiveReload />
      </body>
    </html>
  );
}
```

æœ€çµ‚çš„ã«ã€ãƒ›ãƒ¼ãƒ ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¯æ¬¡ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«ãªã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

![ãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼ã€ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã€ã‚¿ã‚°ãŒã‚ã‚‹Conduitã®ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã€‚ã‚¿ãƒ–ã¯ã¾ã ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚](/documentation/ja/assets/images/realworld-feed-without-tabs-5da4c9072101ac20e82e2234bd3badbe.jpg)

ãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼ã€ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã€ã‚¿ã‚°ãŒã‚ã‚‹Conduitã®ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã€‚ã‚¿ãƒ–ã¯ã¾ã ãªã„ã€‚

### ã‚¿ãƒ–[â€‹](#ã‚¿ãƒ– "ã“ã®è¦‹å‡ºã—ã¸ã®ç›´æ¥ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯")

ã“ã‚Œã§èªè¨¼çŠ¶æ…‹ã‚’åˆ¤æ–­ã§ãã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ãªã£ãŸã®ã§ã€ã‚¿ãƒ–ã¨ã€Œã„ã„ã­ã€ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚’ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã«å®Ÿè£…ã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚æ–°ã—ã„ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ ã‚’ä½œã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ãŒã€ã“ã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã¯ã™ã§ã«å¤§ãã™ãã‚‹ã®ã§ã€ã“ã‚Œã‚‰ã®ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ ã‚’éš£æ¥ã™ã‚‹ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã«ç§»å‹•ã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚`Tabs.tsx`ã€`PopularTags.tsx`ã€`Pagination.tsx`ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã€æ¬¡ã®å†…å®¹ã‚’é…ç½®ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

pages/feed/ui/Tabs.tsx

```
import { useContext } from "react";
import { Form, useSearchParams } from "@remix-run/react";

import { CurrentUser } from "shared/api";

export function Tabs() {
  const [searchParams] = useSearchParams();
  const currentUser = useContext(CurrentUser);

  return (
    <Form>
      <div className="feed-toggle">
        <ul className="nav nav-pills outline-active">
          {currentUser !== null && (
            <li className="nav-item">
              <button
                name="source"
                value="my-feed"
                className={`nav-link ${searchParams.get("source") === "my-feed" ? "active" : ""}`}
              >
                ç§ã®ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ‰
              </button>
            </li>
          )}
          <li className="nav-item">
            <button
              className={`nav-link ${searchParams.has("tag") || searchParams.has("source") ? "" : "active"}`}
            >
              ã‚°ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ«ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ‰
            </button>
          </li>
          {searchParams.has("tag") && (
            <li className="nav-item">
              <span className="nav-link active">
                <i className="ion-pound"></i> {searchParams.get("tag")}
              </span>
            </li>
          )}
        </ul>
      </div>
    </Form>
  );
}
```

pages/feed/ui/PopularTags.tsx

```
import { Form, useLoaderData } from "@remix-run/react";
import { ExistingSearchParams } from "remix-utils/existing-search-params";

import type { loader } from "../api/loader";

export function PopularTags() {
  const { tags } = useLoaderData<typeof loader>();

  return (
    <div className="sidebar">
      <p>äººæ°—ã®ã‚¿ã‚°</p>

      <Form>
        <ExistingSearchParams exclude={["tag", "page", "source"]} />
        <div className="tag-list">
          {tags.tags.map((tag) => (
            <button
              key={tag}
              name="tag"
              value={tag}
              className="tag-pill tag-default"
            >
              {tag}
            </button>
          ))}
        </div>
      </Form>
    </div>
  );
}
```

pages/feed/ui/Pagination.tsx

```
import { Form, useLoaderData, useSearchParams } from "@remix-run/react";
import { ExistingSearchParams } from "remix-utils/existing-search-params";

import { LIMIT, type loader } from "../api/loader";

export function Pagination() {
  const [searchParams] = useSearchParams();
  const { articles } = useLoaderData<typeof loader>();
  const pageAmount = Math.ceil(articles.articlesCount / LIMIT);
  const currentPage = parseInt(searchParams.get("page") ?? "1", 10);

  return (
    <Form>
      <ExistingSearchParams exclude={["page"]} />
      <ul className="pagination">
        {Array(pageAmount)
          .fill(null)
          .map((_, index) =>
            index + 1 === currentPage ? (
              <li key={index} className="page-item active">
                <span className="page-link">{index + 1}</span>
              </li>
            ) : (
              <li key={index} className="page-item">
                <button className="page-link" name="page" value={index + 1}>
                  {index + 1}
                </button>
              </li>
            ),
          )}
      </ul>
    </Form>
  );
}
```

ã“ã‚Œã§ã€ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’å¤§å¹…ã«ç°¡ç´ åŒ–ã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

pages/feed/ui/FeedPage.tsx

```
import { useLoaderData } from "@remix-run/react";

import type { loader } from "../api/loader";
import { ArticlePreview } from "./ArticlePreview";
import { Tabs } from "./Tabs";
import { PopularTags } from "./PopularTags";
import { Pagination } from "./Pagination";

export function FeedPage() {
  const { articles } = useLoaderData<typeof loader>();

  return (
    <div className="home-page">
      <div className="banner">
        <div className="container">
          <h1 className="logo-font">conduit</h1>
          <p>çŸ¥è­˜ã‚’å…±æœ‰ã™ã‚‹å ´</p>
        </div>
      </div>

      <div className="container page">
        <div className="row">
          <div className="col-md-9">
            <Tabs />

            {articles.articles.map((article) => (
              <ArticlePreview key={article.slug} article={article} />
            ))}

            <Pagination />
          </div>

          <div className="col-md-3">
            <PopularTags />
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}
```

ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ¼é–¢æ•°ã«ã‚‚æ–°ã—ã„ã‚¿ãƒ–ã‚’è€ƒæ…®ã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

pages/feed/api/loader.ts

```
import { json, type LoaderFunctionArgs } from "@remix-run/node";
import type { FetchResponse } from "openapi-fetch";
import { promiseHash } from "remix-utils/promise";

import { GET, requireUser } from "shared/api";

async function throwAnyErrors<T, O, Media extends `${string}/${string}`>(
  responsePromise: Promise<FetchResponse<T, O, Media>>,
) {
  /* ãã®ã¾ã¾ */
}

/** 1ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚ãŸã‚Šã®è¨˜äº‹æ•°ã€‚ */
export const LIMIT = 20;

export const loader = async ({ request }: LoaderFunctionArgs) => {
  const url = new URL(request.url);
  const selectedTag = url.searchParams.get("tag") ?? undefined;
  const page = parseInt(url.searchParams.get("page") ?? "", 10);

  if (url.searchParams.get("source") === "my-feed") {
    const userSession = await requireUser(request);

    return json(
      await promiseHash({
        articles: throwAnyErrors(
          GET("/articles/feed", {
            params: {
              query: {
                limit: LIMIT,
                offset: !Number.isNaN(page) ? page * LIMIT : undefined,
              },
            },
            headers: { Authorization: `Token ${userSession.token}` },
          }),
        ),
        tags: throwAnyErrors(GET("/tags")),
      }),
    );
  }

  return json(
    await promiseHash({
      articles: throwAnyErrors(
        GET("/articles", {
          params: {
            query: {
              tag: selectedTag,
              limit: LIMIT,
              offset: !Number.isNaN(page) ? page * LIMIT : undefined,
            },
          },
        }),
      ),
      tags: throwAnyErrors(GET("/tags")),
    }),
  );
};
```

ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’ä¸€æ—¦ç½®ã„ã¦ãŠãå‰ã«ã€æŠ•ç¨¿ã¸ã®ã„ã„ã­ã‚’å‡¦ç†ã™ã‚‹ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’è¿½åŠ ã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚`ArticlePreview.tsx`ã‚’æ¬¡ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«å¤‰æ›´ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

pages/feed/ui/ArticlePreview\.tsx

```
import { Form, Link } from "@remix-run/react";
import type { Article } from "shared/api";

interface ArticlePreviewProps {
  article: Article;
}

export function ArticlePreview({ article }: ArticlePreviewProps) {
  return (
    <div className="article-preview">
      <div className="article-meta">
        <Link to={`/profile/${article.author.username}`} prefetch="intent">
          <img src={article.author.image} alt="" />
        </Link>
        <div className="info">
          <Link
            to={`/profile/${article.author.username}`}
            className="author"
            prefetch="intent"
          >
            {article.author.username}
          </Link>
          <span className="date" suppressHydrationWarning>
            {new Date(article.createdAt).toLocaleDateString(undefined, {
              dateStyle: "long",
            })}
          </span>
        </div>
        <Form
          method="post"
          action={`/article/${article.slug}`}
          preventScrollReset
        >
          <button
            name="_action"
            value={article.favorited ? "unfavorite" : "favorite"}
            className={`btn ${article.favorited ? "btn-primary" : "btn-outline-primary"} btn-sm pull-xs-right`}
          >
            <i className="ion-heart"></i> {article.favoritesCount}
          </button>
        </Form>
      </div>
      <Link
        to={`/article/${article.slug}`}
        className="preview-link"
        prefetch="intent"
      >
        <h1>{article.title}</h1>
        <p>{article.description}</p>
        <span>ã‚‚ã£ã¨èª­ã‚€...</span>
        <ul className="tag-list">
          {article.tagList.map((tag) => (
            <li key={tag} className="tag-default tag-pill tag-outline">
              {tag}
            </li>
          ))}
        </ul>
      </Link>
    </div>
  );
}
```

ã“ã®ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã¯ã€`/article/:slug`ã«POSTãƒªã‚¯ã‚¨ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’é€ä¿¡ã—ã€`_action=favorite`ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã—ã¦è¨˜äº‹ã‚’ãŠæ°—ã«å…¥ã‚Šã«ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ä»Šã¯æ©Ÿèƒ½ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã›ã‚“ãŒã€è¨˜äº‹ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ¼ã®ä½œæˆã‚’å§‹ã‚ã‚‹ã¨ã€ã“ã‚Œã‚‚å®Ÿè£…ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

ã“ã‚Œã§ã€ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã®ä½œæˆãŒå®Œäº†ã—ã¾ã—ãŸï¼ã‚„ã£ãŸã­ï¼

### è¨˜äº‹ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ¼[â€‹](#è¨˜äº‹ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ¼ "ã“ã®è¦‹å‡ºã—ã¸ã®ç›´æ¥ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯")

ã¾ãšã€ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãŒå¿…è¦ã§ã™ã€‚ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ¼ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚

```
npx fsd pages article-read -s api
```

pages/article-read/api/loader.ts

```
import { json, type LoaderFunctionArgs } from "@remix-run/node";
import invariant from "tiny-invariant";
import type { FetchResponse } from "openapi-fetch";
import { promiseHash } from "remix-utils/promise";

import { GET, getUserFromSession } from "shared/api";

async function throwAnyErrors<T, O, Media extends `${string}/${string}`>(
  responsePromise: Promise<FetchResponse<T, O, Media>>,
) {
  const { data, error, response } = await responsePromise;

  if (error !== undefined) {
    throw json(error, { status: response.status });
  }

  return data as NonNullable<typeof data>;
}

export const loader = async ({ request, params }: LoaderFunctionArgs) => {
  invariant(params.slug, "ã‚¹ãƒ©ãƒƒã‚°ãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãŒå¿…è¦ã§ã™");
  const currentUser = await getUserFromSession(request);
  const authorization = currentUser
    ? { Authorization: `Token ${currentUser.token}` }
    : undefined;

  return json(
    await promiseHash({
      article: throwAnyErrors(
        GET("/articles/{slug}", {
          params: {
            path: { slug: params.slug },
          },
          headers: authorization,
        }),
      ),
      comments: throwAnyErrors(
        GET("/articles/{slug}/comments", {
          params: {
            path: { slug: params.slug },
          },
          headers: authorization,
        }),
      ),
    }),
  );
};
```

pages/article-read/index.ts

```
export { loader } from "./api/loader";
```

ã“ã‚Œã§ã€`/article/:slug`ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒˆã«æ¥ç¶šã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚`article.$slug.tsx`ã¨ã„ã†ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒˆãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

app/routes/article.$slug.tsx

```
export { loader } from "pages/article-read";
```

ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸è‡ªä½“ã¯ã€è¨˜äº‹ã®ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«ã¨ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã€è¨˜äº‹ã®æœ¬æ–‡ã€ã‚³ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚»ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã®3ã¤ã®ä¸»è¦ãªãƒ–ãƒ­ãƒƒã‚¯ã§æ§‹æˆã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ä¸‹è¨˜ã¯ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¯ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ã§ã€ç‰¹ã«èˆˆå‘³æ·±ã„ã‚‚ã®ã¯ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚

pages/article-read/ui/ArticleReadPage.tsx

```
import { useLoaderData } from "@remix-run/react";

import type { loader } from "../api/loader";
import { ArticleMeta } from "./ArticleMeta";
import { Comments } from "./Comments";

export function ArticleReadPage() {
  const { article } = useLoaderData<typeof loader>();

  return (
    <div className="article-page">
      <div className="banner">
        <div className="container">
          <h1>{article.article.title}</h1>

          <ArticleMeta />
        </div>
      </div>

      <div className="container page">
        <div className="row article-content">
          <div className="col-md-12">
            <p>{article.article.body}</p>
            <ul className="tag-list">
              {article.article.tagList.map((tag) => (
                <li className="tag-default tag-pill tag-outline" key={tag}>
                  {tag}
                </li>
              ))}
            </ul>
          </div>
        </div>

        <hr />

        <div className="article-actions">
          <ArticleMeta />
        </div>

        <div className="row">
          <Comments />
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}
```

èˆˆå‘³æ·±ã„ã®ã¯`ArticleMeta`ã¨`Comments`ã§ã™ã€‚ã“ã‚Œã‚‰ã¯ã€è¨˜äº‹ã‚’ã€Œã„ã„ã­ã€ã—ãŸã‚Šã€ã‚³ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’æ®‹ã—ãŸã‚Šã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã®æ“ä½œã‚’å«ã‚“ã§ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã‚Œã‚‰ãŒæ©Ÿèƒ½ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã«ã¯ã€ã¾ãšãƒãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ‰éƒ¨åˆ†ã‚’å®Ÿè£…ã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®`api`ã‚»ã‚°ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã«`action.ts`ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

pages/article-read/api/action.ts

```
import { redirect, type ActionFunctionArgs } from "@remix-run/node";
import { namedAction } from "remix-utils/named-action";
import { redirectBack } from "remix-utils/redirect-back";
import invariant from "tiny-invariant";

import { DELETE, POST, requireUser } from "shared/api";

export const action = async ({ request, params }: ActionFunctionArgs) => {
  const currentUser = await requireUser(request);

  const authorization = { Authorization: `Token ${currentUser.token}` };

  const formData = await request.formData();

  return namedAction(formData, {
    async delete() {
      invariant(params.slug, "ã‚¹ãƒ©ãƒƒã‚°ãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãŒå¿…è¦ã§ã™");
      await DELETE("/articles/{slug}", {
        params: { path: { slug: params.slug } },
        headers: authorization,
      });
      return redirect("/");
    },
    async favorite() {
      invariant(params.slug, "ã‚¹ãƒ©ãƒƒã‚°ãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãŒå¿…è¦ã§ã™");
      await POST("/articles/{slug}/favorite", {
        params: { path: { slug: params.slug } },
        headers: authorization,
      });
      return redirectBack(request, { fallback: "/" });
    },
    async unfavorite() {
      invariant(params.slug, "ã‚¹ãƒ©ãƒƒã‚°ãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãŒå¿…è¦ã§ã™");
      await DELETE("/articles/{slug}/favorite", {
        params: { path: { slug: params.slug } },
        headers: authorization,
      });
      return redirectBack(request, { fallback: "/" });
    },
    async createComment() {
      invariant(params.slug, "ã‚¹ãƒ©ãƒƒã‚°ãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãŒå¿…è¦ã§ã™");
      const comment = formData.get("comment");
      invariant(typeof comment === "string", "ã‚³ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãŒå¿…è¦ã§ã™");
      await POST("/articles/{slug}/comments", {
        params: { path: { slug: params.slug } },
        headers: { ...authorization, "Content-Type": "application/json" },
        body: { comment: { body: comment } },
      });
      return redirectBack(request, { fallback: "/" });
    },
    async deleteComment() {
      invariant(params.slug, "ã‚¹ãƒ©ãƒƒã‚°ãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãŒå¿…è¦ã§ã™");
      const commentId = formData.get("id");
      invariant(typeof commentId === "string", "idãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãŒå¿…è¦ã§ã™");
      const commentIdNumeric = parseInt(commentId, 10);
      invariant(
        !Number.isNaN(commentIdNumeric),
        "æ•°å€¤ã®idãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãŒå¿…è¦ã§ã™",
      );
      await DELETE("/articles/{slug}/comments/{id}", {
        params: { path: { slug: params.slug, id: commentIdNumeric } },
        headers: authorization,
      });
      return redirectBack(request, { fallback: "/" });
    },
    async followAuthor() {
      const authorUsername = formData.get("username");
      invariant(
        typeof authorUsername === "string",
        "ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ ãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãŒå¿…è¦ã§ã™",
      );
      await POST("/profiles/{username}/follow", {
        params: { path: { username: authorUsername } },
        headers: authorization,
      });
      return redirectBack(request, { fallback: "/" });
    },
    async unfollowAuthor() {
      const authorUsername = formData.get("username");
      invariant(
        typeof authorUsername === "string",
        "ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ ãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãŒå¿…è¦ã§ã™",
      );
      await DELETE("/profiles/{username}/follow", {
        params: { path: { username: authorUsername } },
        headers: authorization,
      });
      return redirectBack(request, { fallback: "/" });
    },
  });
};
```

ã“ã‚Œã‚’ã‚¹ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚¹ã‹ã‚‰å†ã‚¨ã‚¯ã‚¹ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã—ã€ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒˆã‹ã‚‰å†ã‚¨ã‚¯ã‚¹ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã“ã«ã„ã‚‹é–“ã«ã€ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸è‡ªä½“ã‚‚æ¥ç¶šã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚

ã“ã‚Œã§ã€è¨˜äº‹ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ¼ã®ã€Œã„ã„ã­ã€ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã¯ã¾ã å®Ÿè£…ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ãªã„ã«ã‚‚é–¢ã‚ã‚‰ãšã€ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã®ã€Œã„ã„ã­ã€ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã¯æ©Ÿèƒ½ã—å§‹ã‚ã¾ã™ï¼ãã‚Œã¯ã€ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã®ã€Œã„ã„ã­ã€ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚‚ãã®ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒˆã«ãƒªã‚¯ã‚¨ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’é€ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‹ã‚‰ã§ã™ã€‚ä½•ã‹ã‚’ã€Œã„ã„ã­ã€ã—ã¦ã¿ã¦ãã ã•ã„ï¼

`ArticleMeta`ã¨`Comments`ã¯ã€å˜ãªã‚‹ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ ã§ã™ã€‚ä»¥å‰ã«ã“ã‚Œã‚’è¡Œã£ãŸã®ã§ã€ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’ã‚³ãƒ”ãƒšã—ã¦å…ˆã«é€²ã¿ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚

pages/article-read/ui/ArticleMeta.tsx

```
import { Form, Link, useLoaderData } from "@remix-run/react";
import { useContext } from "react";

import { CurrentUser } from "shared/api";
import type { loader } from "../api/loader";

export function ArticleMeta() {
  const currentUser = useContext(CurrentUser);
  const { article } = useLoaderData<typeof loader>();

  return (
    <Form method="post">
      <div className="article-meta">
        <Link
          prefetch="intent"
          to={`/profile/${article.article.author.username}`}
        >
          <img src={article.article.author.image} alt="" />
        </Link>

        <div className="info">
          <Link
            prefetch="intent"
            to={`/profile/${article.article.author.username}`}
            className="author"
          >
            {article.article.author.username}
          </Link>
          <span className="date">{article.article.createdAt}</span>
        </div>

        {article.article.author.username == currentUser?.username ? (
          <>
            <Link
              prefetch="intent"
              to={`/editor/${article.article.slug}`}
              className="btn btn-sm btn-outline-secondary"
            >
              <i className="ion-edit"></i> è¨˜äº‹ã‚’ç·¨é›†
            </Link>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
            <button
              name="_action"
              value="delete"
              className="btn btn-sm btn-outline-danger"
            >
              <i className="ion-trash-a"></i> è¨˜äº‹ã‚’å‰Šé™¤
            </button>
          </>
        ) : (
          <>
            <input
              name="username"
              value={article.article.author.username}
              type="hidden"
            />
            <button
              name="_action"
              value={
                article.article.author.following
                  ? "unfollowAuthor"
                  : "followAuthor"
              }
              className={`btn btn-sm ${article.article.author.following ? "btn-secondary" : "btn-outline-secondary"}`}
            >
              <i className="ion-plus-round"></i>
              &nbsp;{" "}
              {article.article.author.following
                ? "ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ­ãƒ¼è§£é™¤"
                : "ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ­ãƒ¼"}{" "}
              {article.article.author.username}
            </button>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
            <button
              name="_action"
              value={article.article.favorited ? "unfavorite" : "favorite"}
              className={`btn btn-sm ${article.article.favorited ? "btn-primary" : "btn-outline-primary"}`}
            >
              <i className="ion-heart"></i>
              &nbsp; {article.article.favorited
                ? "ã„ã„ã­è§£é™¤"
                : "ã„ã„ã­"}{" "}
              è¨˜äº‹{" "}
              <span className="counter">
                ({article.article.favoritesCount})
              </span>
            </button>
          </>
        )}
      </div>
    </Form>
  );
}
```

pages/article-read/ui/Comments.tsx

```
import { useContext } from "react";
import { Form, Link, useLoaderData } from "@remix-run/react";

import { CurrentUser } from "shared/api";
import type { loader } from "../api/loader";

export function Comments() {
  const { comments } = useLoaderData<typeof loader>();
  const currentUser = useContext(CurrentUser);

  return (
    <div className="col-xs-12 col-md-8 offset-md-2">
      {currentUser !== null ? (
        <Form
          preventScrollReset={true}
          method="post"
          className="card comment-form"
          key={Date()}
        >
          <div className="card-block">
            <textarea
              required
              className="form-control"
              name="comment"
              placeholder="ã‚³ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’æ›¸ã..."
              rows={3}
            ></textarea>
          </div>
          <div className="card-footer">
            <img
              src={currentUser.image}
              className="comment-author-img"
              alt=""
            />
            <button
              className="btn btn-sm btn-primary"
              name="_action"
              value="createComment"
            >
              ã‚³ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’æŠ•ç¨¿
            </button>
          </div>
        </Form>
      ) : (
        <div className="row">
          <div className="col-xs-12 col-md-8 offset-md-2">
            <p>
              <Link to="/login">ã‚µã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¤ãƒ³</Link>
              &nbsp; ã¾ãŸã¯ &nbsp;
              <Link to="/register">ç™»éŒ²</Link>
              &nbsp; ã—ã¦è¨˜äº‹ã«ã‚³ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’è¿½åŠ ã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ï¼
            </p>
          </div>
        </div>
      )}

      {comments.comments.map((comment) => (
        <div className="card" key={comment.id}>
          <div className="card-block">
            <p className="card-text">{comment.body}</p>
          </div>

          <div className="card-footer">
            <Link
              to={`/profile/${comment.author.username}`}
              className="comment-author"
            >
              <img
                src={comment.author.image}
                className="comment-author-img"
                alt=""
              />
            </Link>
            &nbsp;
            <Link
              to={`/profile/${comment.author.username}`}
              className="comment-author"
            >
              {comment.author.username}
            </Link>
            <span className="date-posted">{comment.createdAt}</span>
            {comment.author.username === currentUser?.username && (
              <span className="mod-options">
                <Form method="post" preventScrollReset={true}>
                  <input type="hidden" name="id" value={comment.id} />
                  <button
                    name="_action"
                    value="deleteComment"
                    style={{
                      border: "none",
                      outline: "none",
                      backgroundColor: "transparent",
                    }}
                  >
                    <i className="ion-trash-a"></i>
                  </button>
                </Form>
              </span>
            )}
          </div>
        </div>
      ))}
    </div>
  );
}
```

ã“ã‚Œã§ã€è¨˜äº‹ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ¼ãŒå®Œæˆã—ã¾ã—ãŸï¼ã€Œè‘—è€…ã‚’ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã™ã‚‹ã€ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã€ã€Œã„ã„ã­ã€ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã€ã€Œã‚³ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’æ®‹ã™ã€ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ãŒã™ã¹ã¦æ­£å¸¸ã«æ©Ÿèƒ½ã™ã‚‹ã¯ãšã§ã™ã€‚

![è¨˜äº‹ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ¼ã®ç”»åƒ](/documentation/ja/assets/images/realworld-article-reader-6a420e4f2afe139d2bdd54d62974f0b9.jpg)

è¨˜äº‹ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ¼ã®ç”»åƒ

### è¨˜äº‹ç·¨é›†[â€‹](#è¨˜äº‹ç·¨é›† "ã“ã®è¦‹å‡ºã—ã¸ã®ç›´æ¥ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯")

ã“ã‚Œã¯ã€ã“ã®ã‚¬ã‚¤ãƒ‰ã§æœ€å¾Œã«å–ã‚Šä¸Šã’ã‚‹ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã§ã™ã€‚ã“ã“ã§æœ€ã‚‚èˆˆå‘³æ·±ã„éƒ¨åˆ†ã¯ã€ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’æ¤œè¨¼ã™ã‚‹æ–¹æ³•ã§ã™ã€‚

`article-edit/ui/ArticleEditPage.tsx`ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸è‡ªä½“ã¯ã€éå¸¸ã«ã‚·ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ã§ã€è¿½åŠ ã®ãƒ­ã‚¸ãƒƒã‚¯ã¯ä»–ã®2ã¤ã®ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆã«å«ã¾ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚

pages/article-edit/ui/ArticleEditPage.tsx

```
import { Form, useLoaderData } from "@remix-run/react";

import type { loader } from "../api/loader";
import { TagsInput } from "./TagsInput";
import { FormErrors } from "./FormErrors";

export function ArticleEditPage() {
  const article = useLoaderData<typeof loader>();

  return (
    <div className="editor-page">
      <div className="container page">
        <div className="row">
          <div className="col-md-10 offset-md-1 col-xs-12">
            <FormErrors />

            <Form method="post">
              <fieldset>
                <fieldset className="form-group">
                  <input
                    type="text"
                    className="form-control form-control-lg"
                    name="title"
                    placeholder="è¨˜äº‹ã®ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«"
                    defaultValue={article.article?.title}
                  />
                </fieldset>
                <fieldset className="form-group">
                  <input
                    type="text"
                    className="form-control"
                    name="description"
                    placeholder="ã“ã®è¨˜äº‹ã¯ä½•ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã§ã™ã‹ï¼Ÿ"
                    defaultValue={article.article?.description}
                  />
                </fieldset>
                <fieldset className="form-group">
                  <textarea
                    className="form-control"
                    name="body"
                    rows={8}
                    placeholder="è¨˜äº‹ã‚’è¨˜è¿°ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ï¼ˆãƒãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³å½¢å¼ï¼‰"
                    defaultValue={article.article?.body}
                  ></textarea>
                </fieldset>
                <fieldset className="form-group">
                  <TagsInput
                    name="tags"
                    defaultValue={article.article?.tagList ?? []}
                  />
                </fieldset>

                <button className="btn btn-lg pull-xs-right btn-primary">
                  è¨˜äº‹ã‚’å…¬é–‹
                </button>
              </fieldset>
            </Form>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}
```

ã“ã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¯ã€å­˜åœ¨ã™ã‚‹è¨˜äº‹ã‚’å–å¾—ã—ï¼ˆæ–°ã—ã„è¨˜äº‹ã‚’ä½œæˆã™ã‚‹å ´åˆã‚’é™¤ãï¼‰ã€å¯¾å¿œã™ã‚‹ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ‰ã‚’åŸ‹ã‚ã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã‚Œã¯ä»¥å‰ã«è¦‹ãŸã‚‚ã®ã§ã™ã€‚ç€ç›®ã™ã¹ãéƒ¨åˆ†ã¯`FormErrors`ã§ã€ã“ã‚Œã¯æ¤œè¨¼çµæœã‚’å–å¾—ã—ã€ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã«è¡¨ç¤ºã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

pages/article-edit/ui/FormErrors.tsx

```
import { useActionData } from "@remix-run/react";
import type { action } from "../api/action";

export function FormErrors() {
  const actionData = useActionData<typeof action>();

  return actionData?.errors != null ? (
    <ul className="error-messages">
      {actionData.errors.map((error) => (
        <li key={error}>{error}</li>
      ))}
    </ul>
  ) : null;
}
```

ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ãŒ`errors`ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ‰ã‚’è¿”ã—ã€äººé–“ã«ç†è§£ã§ãã‚‹ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®é…åˆ—ã‚’è¡¨ç¤ºã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’æƒ³å®šã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã«ã¯å¾Œã§ç§»ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

ã‚‚ã†1ã¤ã®ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆã¯ã‚¿ã‚°å…¥åŠ›ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ‰ã§ã™ã€‚ã“ã‚Œã¯ã€é¸æŠã•ã‚ŒãŸã‚¿ã‚°ã®ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ“ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã§ãã‚‹é€šå¸¸ã®å…¥åŠ›ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ‰ã§ã™ã€‚ç‰¹ã«æ³¨ç›®ã™ã¹ãç‚¹ã¯ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚

pages/article-edit/ui/TagsInput.tsx

```
import { useEffect, useRef, useState } from "react";

export function TagsInput({
  name,
  defaultValue,
}: {
  name: string;
  defaultValue?: Array<string>;
}) {
  const [tagListState, setTagListState] = useState(defaultValue ?? []);

  function removeTag(tag: string): void {
    const newTagList = tagListState.filter((t) => t !== tag);
    setTagListState(newTagList);
  }

  const tagsInput = useRef<HTMLInputElement>(null);
  useEffect(() => {
    tagsInput.current && (tagsInput.current.value = tagListState.join(","));
  }, [tagListState]);

  return (
    <>
      <input
        type="text"
        className="form-control"
        id="tags"
        name={name}
        placeholder="ã‚¿ã‚°ã‚’å…¥åŠ›"
        defaultValue={tagListState.join(",")}
        onChange={(e) =>
          setTagListState(e.target.value.split(",").filter(Boolean))
        }
      />
      <div className="tag-list">
        {tagListState.map((tag) => (
          <span className="tag-default tag-pill" key={tag}>
            <i
              className="ion-close-round"
              role="button"
              tabIndex={0}
              onKeyDown={(e) =>
                [" ", "Enter"].includes(e.key) && removeTag(tag)
              }
              onClick={() => removeTag(tag)}
            ></i>{" "}
            {tag}
          </span>
        ))}
      </div>
    </>
  );
}
```

æ¬¡ã«ã€APIéƒ¨åˆ†ã«ç§»ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ¼ã¯URLã‚’ç¢ºèªã—ã€è¨˜äº‹ã¸ã®ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯ãŒã‚ã‚‹å ´åˆã€æ—¢å­˜ã®è¨˜äº‹ã‚’ç·¨é›†ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’æ„å‘³ã—ã€ãã®ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ãã†ã§ãªã„å ´åˆã¯ã€ä½•ã‚‚è¿”ã—ã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚ã“ã®ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ¼ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚

pages/article-edit/api/loader.ts

```
import { json, type LoaderFunctionArgs } from "@remix-run/node";
import type { FetchResponse } from "openapi-fetch";

import { GET, requireUser } from "shared/api";

async function throwAnyErrors<T, O, Media extends `${string}/${string}`>(
  responsePromise: Promise<FetchResponse<T, O, Media>>,
) {
  const { data, error, response } = await responsePromise;

  if (error !== undefined) {
    throw json(error, { status: response.status });
  }

  return data as NonNullable<typeof data>;
}

export const loader = async ({ params, request }: LoaderFunctionArgs) => {
  const currentUser = await requireUser(request);

  if (!params.slug) {
    return { article: null };
  }

  return throwAnyErrors(
    GET("/articles/{slug}", {
      params: { path: { slug: params.slug } },
      headers: { Authorization: `Token ${currentUser.token}` },
    }),
  );
};
```

ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã¯æ–°ã—ã„ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ‰ã®å€¤ã‚’å—ã‘å–ã‚Šã€ãã‚Œã‚‰ã‚’ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒ¼ãƒã«é€šã—ã€ã™ã¹ã¦ãŒæ­£ã—ã‘ã‚Œã°ã€æ—¢å­˜ã®è¨˜äº‹ã‚’æ›´æ–°ã™ã‚‹ã‹ã€æ–°ã—ã„è¨˜äº‹ã‚’ä½œæˆã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã«ã‚ˆã£ã¦ã€ãƒãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ‰ã«å¤‰æ›´ã‚’ä¿å­˜ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

pages/article-edit/api/action.ts

```
import { json, redirect, type ActionFunctionArgs } from "@remix-run/node";

import { POST, PUT, requireUser } from "shared/api";
import { parseAsArticle } from "../model/parseAsArticle";

export const action = async ({ request, params }: ActionFunctionArgs) => {
  try {
    const { body, description, title, tags } = parseAsArticle(
      await request.formData(),
    );
    const tagList = tags?.split(",") ?? [];

    const currentUser = await requireUser(request);
    const payload = {
      body: {
        article: {
          title,
          description,
          body,
          tagList,
        },
      },
      headers: { Authorization: `Token ${currentUser.token}` },
    };

    const { data, error } = await (params.slug
      ? PUT("/articles/{slug}", {
          params: { path: { slug: params.slug } },
          ...payload,
        })
      : POST("/articles", payload));

    if (error) {
      return json({ errors: error }, { status: 422 });
    }

    return redirect(`/article/${data.article.slug ?? ""}`);
  } catch (errors) {
    return json({ errors }, { status: 400 });
  }
};
```

ç§ãŸã¡ã®ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒ¼ãƒã¯ã€`FormData`ã‚’è§£æã™ã‚‹ã®ã§ã€æœ€çµ‚çš„ã«å‡¦ç†ã™ã‚‹ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’æŠ•ã’ãŸã‚Šã™ã‚‹ã®ã«å½¹ç«‹ã¡ã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã®è§£æé–¢æ•°ã¯æ¬¡ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«ãªã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

pages/article-edit/model/parseAsArticle.ts

```
export function parseAsArticle(data: FormData) {
  const errors = [];

  const title = data.get("title");
  if (typeof title !== "string" || title === "") {
    errors.push("è¨˜äº‹ã«ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«ã‚’ä»˜ã‘ã¦ãã ã•ã„");
  }

  const description = data.get("description");
  if (typeof description !== "string" || description === "") {
    errors.push("ã“ã®è¨˜äº‹ãŒä½•ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã‹èª¬æ˜ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„");
  }

  const body = data.get("body");
  if (typeof body !== "string" || body === "") {
    errors.push("è¨˜äº‹ãã®ã‚‚ã®ã‚’æ›¸ã„ã¦ãã ã•ã„");
  }

  const tags = data.get("tags");
  if (typeof tags !== "string") {
    errors.push("ã‚¿ã‚°ã¯æ–‡å­—åˆ—ã§ã‚ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™");
  }

  if (errors.length > 0) {
    throw errors;
  }

  return { title, description, body, tags: data.get("tags") ?? "" } as {
    title: string;
    description: string;
    body: string;
    tags: string;
  };
}
```

å°‘ã—é•·ãç¹°ã‚Šè¿”ã—ãŒå¤šã„ã‚ˆã†ã«è¦‹ãˆã‚‹ã‹ã‚‚ã—ã‚Œã¾ã›ã‚“ãŒã€ã“ã‚Œã¯ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’äººé–“ã«ç†è§£ã—ã‚„ã™ãã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã®ä»£å„Ÿã§ã™ã€‚Zodã®ã‚ˆã†ãªã‚¹ã‚­ãƒ¼ãƒã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚‚ã§ãã¾ã™ãŒã€ãã®å ´åˆã€ãƒ•ãƒ­ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ‰ã§ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’è¡¨ç¤ºã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã®ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ ã¯ãã®ã‚ˆã†ãªè¤‡é›‘ã•ã«ã¯å€¤ã—ã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚

æœ€å¾Œã®ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒƒãƒ—ã¯ã€ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã€ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ¼ã€ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚’ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒˆã«æ¥ç¶šã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§ã™ã€‚ç§ãŸã¡ã¯ä½œæˆã¨ç·¨é›†ã®ä¸¡æ–¹ã‚’ãã‚Œã„ã«ã‚µãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã®ã§ã€`editor._index.tsx`ã¨`editor.$slug.tsx`ã®ä¸¡æ–¹ã‹ã‚‰åŒã˜ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚’ã‚¨ã‚¯ã‚¹ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

pages/article-edit/index.ts

```
export { ArticleEditPage } from "./ui/ArticleEditPage";
export { loader } from "./api/loader";
export { action } from "./api/action";
```

app/routes/editor.\_index.tsx, app/routes/editor.$slug.tsx (åŒã˜å†…å®¹)

```
import { ArticleEditPage } from "pages/article-edit";

export { loader, action } from "pages/article-edit";

export default ArticleEditPage;
```

ã“ã‚Œã§å®Œæˆã§ã™ï¼ãƒ­ã‚°ã‚¤ãƒ³ã—ã¦æ–°ã—ã„è¨˜äº‹ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¦ã¿ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚ã‚ã‚‹ã„ã¯ã€ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ‰ã«ä½•ã‚‚è¨˜å…¥ã›ãšé€²ã¿ã€ãƒãƒªãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ãŒã©ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«æ©Ÿèƒ½ã™ã‚‹ã‹ã‚’æ¤œè¨¼ã—ã¦ã¿ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

![è¨˜äº‹ç·¨é›†è€…ã®ç”»åƒ](/documentation/ja/assets/images/realworld-article-editor-bc3ee45c96ae905fdbb54d6463d12723.jpg)

è¨˜äº‹ç·¨é›†ç”»åƒ

ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚„è¨­å®šãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¯ã€è¨˜äº‹ã®èª­ã¿å–ã‚Šã‚„ç·¨é›†ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã«éå¸¸ã«ä¼¼ã¦ã„ã¦ã€èª­è€…ã®ãŸã‚ã®å®¿é¡Œã¨ã—ã¦æ®‹ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚


---

# Handling API Requests

## Shared API Requests[â€‹](#shared-api-requests "ã“ã®è¦‹å‡ºã—ã¸ã®ç›´æ¥ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯")

Start by placing common API request logic in the `shared/api` directory. This makes it easy to reuse requests across your application and helps with faster prototyping. For many projects, this is all you'll need for API calls.

A typical file structure would be:

* ğŸ“‚ shared

  <!-- -->

  * ğŸ“‚ api

    <!-- -->

    * ğŸ“„ client.ts
    * ğŸ“„ index.ts
    * ğŸ“‚ endpoints
      <!-- -->
      * ğŸ“„ login.ts

The `client.ts` file centralizes your HTTP request setup. It wraps your chosen method (like `fetch()` or an `axios` instance) and handles common configurations, such as:

* Backend base URL.
* Default headers (e.g., for authentication).
* Data serialization.

Here are examples for `axios` and `fetch`:

* Axios
* Fetch

shared/api/client.ts

```
// Example using axios
import axios from 'axios';

export const client = axios.create({
  baseURL: 'https://your-api-domain.com/api/',
  timeout: 5000,
  headers: { 'X-Custom-Header': 'my-custom-value' }
});
```

shared/api/client.ts

```
export const client = {
  async post(endpoint: string, body: any, options?: RequestInit) {
    const response = await fetch(`https://your-api-domain.com/api${endpoint}`, {
      method: 'POST',
      body: JSON.stringify(body),
      ...options,
      headers: {
        'Content-Type': 'application/json',
        'X-Custom-Header': 'my-custom-value',
        ...options?.headers,
      },
    });
    return response.json();
  }
  // ... other methods like put, delete, etc.
};
```

Organize your individual API request functions in `shared/api/endpoints`, grouping them by the API endpoint.

æ³¨è¨˜

To keep examples focused, we omit form interaction and validation. For details on libraries like Zod or Valibot, refer to the [Type Validation and Schemas](/documentation/ja/docs/guides/examples/types.md#type-validation-schemas-and-zod) article.

shared/api/endpoints/login.ts

```
import { client } from '../client';

export interface LoginCredentials {
  email: string;
  password: string;
}

export function login(credentials: LoginCredentials) {
  return client.post('/login', credentials);
}
```

Use an `index.ts` file in `shared/api` to export your request functions.

shared/api/index.ts

```
export { client } from './client'; // If you want to export the client itself
export { login } from './endpoints/login';
export type { LoginCredentials } from './endpoints/login';
```

## Slice-Specific API Requests[â€‹](#slice-specific-api-requests "ã“ã®è¦‹å‡ºã—ã¸ã®ç›´æ¥ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯")

If an API request is only used by a specific slice (like a single page or feature) and won't be reused, place it in the api segment of that slice. This keeps slice-specific logic neatly contained.

* ğŸ“‚ pages

  <!-- -->

  * ğŸ“‚ login

    <!-- -->

    * ğŸ“„ index.ts
    * ğŸ“‚ api
      <!-- -->
      * ğŸ“„ login.ts
    * ğŸ“‚ ui
      <!-- -->
      * ğŸ“„ LoginPage.tsx

pages/login/api/login.ts

```
import { client } from 'shared/api';

interface LoginCredentials {
  email: string;
  password: string;
}

export function login(credentials: LoginCredentials) {
  return client.post('/login', credentials);
}
```

You don't need to export `login()` function in the page's public API, because it's unlikely that any other place in the app will need this request.

æ³¨è¨˜

Avoid placing API calls and response types in the `entities` layer prematurely. Backend responses may differ from what your frontend entities need. API logic in `shared/api` or a slice's `api` segment allows you to transform data appropriately, keeping entities focused on frontend concerns.

## Using Client Generators[â€‹](#client-generators "ã“ã®è¦‹å‡ºã—ã¸ã®ç›´æ¥ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯")

If your backend has an OpenAPI specification, tools like [orval](https://orval.dev/) or [openapi-typescript](https://openapi-ts.dev/) can generate API types and request functions for you. Place the generated code in, for example, `shared/api/openapi`. Make sure to include `README.md` to document what those types are, and how to generate them.

## Integrating with Server State Libraries[â€‹](#server-state-libraries "ã“ã®è¦‹å‡ºã—ã¸ã®ç›´æ¥ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯")

When using server state libraries like [TanStack Query (React Query)](https://tanstack.com/query/latest) or [Pinia Colada](https://pinia-colada.esm.dev/) you might need to share types or cache keys between slices. Use the `shared` layer for things like:

* API data types
* Cache keys
* Common query/mutation options

For more details on how to work with server state libraries, refer to [React Query article](/documentation/ja/docs/guides/tech/with-react-query.md)


---

# èªè¨¼

ä¸€èˆ¬çš„ã«ã€èªè¨¼ã¯ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒƒãƒ—ã§æ§‹æˆã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚

1. ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã‹ã‚‰è³‡æ ¼æƒ…å ±ã‚’å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹
2. ãã‚Œã‚’ãƒãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ‰ã«é€ä¿¡ã™ã‚‹
3. èªè¨¼ã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒªã‚¯ã‚¨ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’é€ä¿¡ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã®ãƒˆãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ³ã‚’ä¿å­˜ã™ã‚‹

## ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã®è³‡æ ¼æƒ…å ±ã‚’å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹æ–¹æ³•[â€‹](#ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã®è³‡æ ¼æƒ…å ±ã‚’å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹æ–¹æ³• "ã“ã®è¦‹å‡ºã—ã¸ã®ç›´æ¥ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯")

OAuthã‚’é€šã˜ã¦èªè¨¼ã‚’è¡Œã†å ´åˆã¯ã€OAuthãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒã‚¤ãƒ€ãƒ¼ã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¸ã®ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯ã‚’æŒã¤ãƒ­ã‚°ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã€[ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒƒãƒ—3](#how-to-store-the-token-for-authenticated-requests)ã«é€²ã‚€ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

### ãƒ­ã‚°ã‚¤ãƒ³ç”¨ã®åˆ¥ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸[â€‹](#ãƒ­ã‚°ã‚¤ãƒ³ç”¨ã®åˆ¥ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ "ã“ã®è¦‹å‡ºã—ã¸ã®ç›´æ¥ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯")

é€šå¸¸ã€ã‚¦ã‚§ãƒ–ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆã«ã¯ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼åã¨ãƒ‘ã‚¹ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã®ãƒ­ã‚°ã‚¤ãƒ³å°‚ç”¨ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã‚Œã‚‰ã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¯éå¸¸ã«ã‚·ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ã§ã‚ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã€åˆ†è§£ã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ã¯ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚ã•ã‚‰ã«ã€ãƒ­ã‚°ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ ã¨ç™»éŒ²ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ ã¯å¤–è¦‹ãŒéå¸¸ã«ä¼¼ã¦ã„ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã€åŒã˜ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã«ã‚°ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ—åŒ–ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚‚ã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚ãƒ­ã‚°ã‚¤ãƒ³/ç™»éŒ²ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ç”¨ã®ã‚¹ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚¹ã‚’Pageså±¤ã«ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

* ğŸ“‚ pages

  <!-- -->

  * ğŸ“‚ login

    <!-- -->

    * ğŸ“‚ ui

      <!-- -->

      * ğŸ“„ LoginPage.tsx
      * ğŸ“„ RegisterPage.tsx

    * ğŸ“„ index.ts

  * ãã®ä»–ã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸â€¦

ã“ã“ã§ã¯ã€2ã¤ã®ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã€ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ‡ãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¹ã§ä¸¡æ–¹ã‚’ã‚¨ã‚¯ã‚¹ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ã“ã‚Œã‚‰ã®ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆã¯ã€ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ãŒè³‡æ ¼æƒ…å ±ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã®ã‚ã‹ã‚Šã‚„ã™ã„è¦ç´ ã‚’å«ã‚€ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ ã‚’æŒã¡ã¾ã™ã€‚

### ãƒ­ã‚°ã‚¤ãƒ³ç”¨ã®ãƒ€ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ­ã‚°ãƒœãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¹[â€‹](#ãƒ­ã‚°ã‚¤ãƒ³ç”¨ã®ãƒ€ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ­ã‚°ãƒœãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¹ "ã“ã®è¦‹å‡ºã—ã¸ã®ç›´æ¥ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯")

ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã«ã©ã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã§ã‚‚ä½¿ç”¨ã§ãã‚‹ãƒ­ã‚°ã‚¤ãƒ³ç”¨ã®ãƒ€ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ­ã‚°ãƒœãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¹ãŒã‚ã‚‹å ´åˆã¯ã€ãã®ãƒ€ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ­ã‚°ãƒœãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¹ç”¨ã®ã‚¦ã‚£ã‚¸ã‚§ãƒƒãƒˆã‚’ä½œæˆã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã‚Œã«ã‚ˆã‚Šã€ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ è‡ªä½“ã‚’ã‚ã¾ã‚Šåˆ†è§£ã›ãšã«ã€ã©ã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã§ã‚‚ã“ã®ãƒ€ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ­ã‚°ãƒœãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¹ã‚’å†åˆ©ç”¨ã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

* ğŸ“‚ widgets

  <!-- -->

  * ğŸ“‚ login-dialog

    <!-- -->

    * ğŸ“‚ ui
      <!-- -->
      * ğŸ“„ LoginDialog.tsx
    * ğŸ“„ index.ts

  * ãã®ä»–ã®ã‚¦ã‚£ã‚¸ã‚§ãƒƒãƒˆâ€¦

ã“ã®ã‚¬ã‚¤ãƒ‰ã®æ®‹ã‚Šã®éƒ¨åˆ†ã¯ã€ãƒ­ã‚°ã‚¤ãƒ³ãŒåˆ¥ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã§è¡Œã‚ã‚Œã‚‹æœ€åˆã®ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒã«åŸºã¥ã„ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ãŒã€åŒã˜åŸå‰‡ãŒãƒ€ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ­ã‚°ãƒœãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¹ç”¨ã®ã‚¦ã‚£ã‚¸ã‚§ãƒƒãƒˆã«ã‚‚é©ç”¨ã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚

### ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒˆãƒãƒªãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³[â€‹](#ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒˆãƒãƒªãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ "ã“ã®è¦‹å‡ºã—ã¸ã®ç›´æ¥ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯")

ãŸã¾ã«ã¯ã€ç‰¹ã«ç™»éŒ²æ™‚ã«ã€ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒˆå´ã§æ¤œè¨¼ã‚’è¡Œã„ã€ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã«ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ã‚’è¿…é€Ÿã«é€šçŸ¥ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã®å ´åˆã€æ¤œè¨¼ã¯ã€ãƒ­ã‚°ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®`model`ã‚»ã‚°ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã§è¡Œã†ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒ¼ãƒæ¤œè¨¼ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ–ãƒ©ãƒªã€ä¾‹ãˆã°[Zod](https://zod.dev)ã‚’JS/TSç”¨ã«ä½¿ç”¨ã—ã€ã“ã®ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒ¼ãƒã‚’`ui`ã‚»ã‚°ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã«æä¾›ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

pages/login/model/registration-schema.ts

```
import { z } from "zod";

export const registrationData = z.object({
    email: z.string().email(),
    password: z.string().min(6),
    confirmPassword: z.string(),
}).refine((data) => data.password === data.confirmPassword, {
    message: "ãƒ‘ã‚¹ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãŒä¸€è‡´ã—ã¾ã›ã‚“",
    path: ["confirmPassword"],
});
```

æ¬¡ã«ã€`ui`ã‚»ã‚°ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã§ã“ã®ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒ¼ãƒã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã—ã¦ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼å…¥åŠ›ã‚’æ¤œè¨¼ã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

pages/login/ui/RegisterPage.tsx

```
import { registrationData } from "../model/registration-schema";

function validate(formData: FormData) {
    const data = Object.fromEntries(formData.entries());
    try {
        registrationData.parse(data);
    } catch (error) {
        // TODO: ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã«ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’è¡¨ç¤º
    }
}

export function RegisterPage() {
    return (
        <form onSubmit={(e) => validate(new FormData(e.target))}>
            <label htmlFor="email">ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ã‚¹</label>
            <input id="email" name="email" required />

            <label htmlFor="password">ãƒ‘ã‚¹ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ï¼ˆæœ€å°6æ–‡å­—ï¼‰</label>
            <input id="password" name="password" type="password" required />

            <label htmlFor="confirmPassword">ãƒ‘ã‚¹ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’ç¢ºèª</label>
            <input id="confirmPassword" name="confirmPassword" type="password" required />
        </form>
    )
}
```

## è³‡æ ¼æƒ…å ±ã‚’ãƒãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ‰ã«é€ä¿¡ã™ã‚‹æ–¹æ³•[â€‹](#è³‡æ ¼æƒ…å ±ã‚’ãƒãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ‰ã«é€ä¿¡ã™ã‚‹æ–¹æ³• "ã“ã®è¦‹å‡ºã—ã¸ã®ç›´æ¥ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯")

ãƒãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ‰ã®ãƒ­ã‚°ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒˆã«ãƒªã‚¯ã‚¨ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’é€ä¿¡ã™ã‚‹é–¢æ•°ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚ã“ã®é–¢æ•°ã¯ã€ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆã®ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰å†…ã§ãƒŸãƒ¥ãƒ¼ãƒ†ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ–ãƒ©ãƒªï¼ˆä¾‹ãˆã°ã€TanStack Queryï¼‰ã‚’é€šã˜ã¦ç›´æ¥å‘¼ã³å‡ºã™ã“ã¨ã‚‚ã€çŠ¶æ…‹ç®¡ç†ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ–ãƒ©ãƒªã®å‰¯ä½œç”¨ã¨ã—ã¦å‘¼ã³å‡ºã™ã“ã¨ã‚‚ã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

### ãƒªã‚¯ã‚¨ã‚¹ãƒˆé–¢æ•°ã‚’ã©ã“ã«ç½®ãã‹[â€‹](#ãƒªã‚¯ã‚¨ã‚¹ãƒˆé–¢æ•°ã‚’ã©ã“ã«ç½®ãã‹ "ã“ã®è¦‹å‡ºã—ã¸ã®ç›´æ¥ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯")

ã“ã®é–¢æ•°ã‚’ç½®ãå ´æ‰€ã¯2ã¤ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™: `shared/api`ã¾ãŸã¯ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®`api`ã‚»ã‚°ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã§ã™ã€‚

#### `shared/api`ã«[â€‹](#sharedapiã« "ã“ã®è¦‹å‡ºã—ã¸ã®ç›´æ¥ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯")

ã“ã®ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒã¯ã€ã™ã¹ã¦ã®ãƒªã‚¯ã‚¨ã‚¹ãƒˆé–¢æ•°ã‚’`shared/api`ã«é…ç½®ã—ã€ã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒˆã”ã¨ã«ã‚°ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ—åŒ–ã™ã‚‹ã®ã«é©ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã®å ´åˆã€ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«æ§‹é€ ã¯æ¬¡ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«ãªã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

* ğŸ“‚ shared

  <!-- -->

  * ğŸ“‚ api

    <!-- -->

    * ğŸ“‚ endpoints

      <!-- -->

      * ğŸ“„ login.ts
      * ãã®ä»–ã®ãƒªã‚¯ã‚¨ã‚¹ãƒˆé–¢æ•°â€¦

    * ğŸ“„ client.ts

    * ğŸ“„ index.ts

`ğŸ“„ client.ts`ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã«ã¯ã€ãƒªã‚¯ã‚¨ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’å®Ÿè¡Œã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã®ãƒ—ãƒªãƒŸãƒ†ã‚£ãƒ–ã®ãƒ©ãƒƒãƒ‘ãƒ¼ãŒå«ã¾ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã™ï¼ˆä¾‹ãˆã°ã€`fetch()`ï¼‰ã€‚ã“ã®ãƒ©ãƒƒãƒ‘ãƒ¼ã¯ã€ãƒãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ‰ã®ãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚¹URLã‚’çŸ¥ã£ã¦ãŠã‚Šã€å¿…è¦ãªãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼ã‚’è¨­å®šã—ã€ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’ã‚·ãƒªã‚¢ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚ºã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

shared/api/endpoints/login.ts

```
import { POST } from "../client";

export function login({ email, password }: { email: string, password: string }) {
    return POST("/login", { email, password });
}
```

shared/api/index.ts

```
export { login } from "./endpoints/login";
```

#### ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®`api`ã‚»ã‚°ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã«[â€‹](#ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®apiã‚»ã‚°ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã« "ã“ã®è¦‹å‡ºã—ã¸ã®ç›´æ¥ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯")

ã™ã¹ã¦ã®ãƒªã‚¯ã‚¨ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’1ã‹æ‰€ã«ä¿å­˜ã—ã¦ã„ãªã„å ´åˆã¯ã€ãƒ­ã‚°ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®`api`ã‚»ã‚°ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã«ã“ã®ãƒªã‚¯ã‚¨ã‚¹ãƒˆé–¢æ•°ã‚’é…ç½®ã™ã‚‹ã®ãŒé©ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‹ã‚‚ã—ã‚Œã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚

* ğŸ“‚ pages

  <!-- -->

  * ğŸ“‚ login

    <!-- -->
